Description.Text: It's all about elegant accomodation, fabulous views, unique flavors, pampering spa treatments, genuine warm hospitality, boutique luxury living. Thalatta Seaside Hotel member of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World blessed with the pristine beachfront of the blue Aegean Sea of Agia Anna Beach and surrounded by a rich green pine forest offers absolute tranquility and rejuvenation holidays. An ideal retreat for families and couples! The unique location of Thalatta Seaside, coupled with the hotel's creative architecture of contemporary design, offer to the demanding modern traveler a heavenly getaway.

Just 156km, 2,5 hours drive from Athens International Airport in the emerald island of Evia, close to Sporades (Skiathos, Skopelos, Allonisos) for daily cruises and excursions to much more unique natural beauty and interesting attractions.
